content: Every time I try to post something from Reach onto Threads, all I see is the link text and not the post itself. I’ve tried copying directly from the “Select App” button but that doesn’t work either…

That doesn’t work all the time. It’s acts like it’s copied but there’s nothing to paste when I’m in threads…

I’ve gotten it to work with pictures but not video or audio.
For non-text, you'd have to download and upload.  (I know it's more work, but it actually boosts your posts in feeds because the algo prefers new content over shared ones.)
I understand that this is the workaround, but this should not be the expected norm.  Is there a way to fill bug reports with the people who make the Reach app?

Feedback has been filed! I used the problems described here as the text, and included a screenshot
https://feedback.reach.vote/posts/176/reach-posts-not-displaying-correctly-in-threads
